dcterms:description: A publicly available dataset containing investigation reports of civil aviation accidents in the US, used to construct an Aviation Knowledge Graph.
dcterms:title: National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) reports

dcterms:description: A publicly available dataset that gathers information from pilots and crew members about close call events during flight journeys, utilized in the construction of the Aviation Knowledge Graph.
dcterms:title: Aviation Safety Reporting System (ASRS) reports

dcterms:description: Notifications to owners of certified aircraft about unsafe conditions that exist in particular aircraft models and the corresponding corrective measures, used in the context of aviation safety.
dcterms:title: Airworthiness Directives (ADs)

dcterms:description: A complex multi-level hierarchy of factual and analytical descriptors related to accidents, used for constructing ontology in the aviation domain.
dcterms:title: Accident/Incident Data Reporting (ADREP) Taxonomy

dcterms:creator: E. F. Sang
F. De Meulder
dcterms:description: A dataset used for training Named Entity Recognition models, which is referenced in the context of entity extraction from NTSB reports.
dcterms:title: CoNLL dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Rajpurkar
R. Jia
P. Liang
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes unanswerable questions for training models in question answering, referenced in the context of evaluating the QA system.
dcterms:title: SQuAD 2.0 dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Pennington
R. Socher
C. D. Manning
dcterms:description: A dataset providing global vectors for word representation, referenced in the context of deep learning models for question answering.
dcterms:title: GloVe word embeddings

dcterms:creator: S. Robertson
H. Zaragoza
dcterms:description: A probabilistic relevance framework used for information retrieval, referenced in the context of the QA system's baseline model.
dcterms:title: BM25
